news.headline: ExxonMobil Deems Gas Find at Elektra-1 Well Commercially Unviable
news.summary: XOM's preliminary assessments indicate that the gas reserves at the Elektra-1 prospect are commercially infeasible for development.

news.headline: Desiring Durable Passive Income During an Economic Downturn? These Elite Dividend Stocks Have Hiked Their Payouts In Each of the Last 4 Recessions.
news.summary: Economic forecasters are raising the odds that we could experience a recession in the coming quarters.
